head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LAWRENCE, RUDDICK C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LAWRENCE, RUDDICK C.

block.p: LAWRENCE - Ruddick C. Of Bronxville and Shelter Island, NY, on September 30. Beloved husband of Cherry McDonnell Lawrence. Devoted father of Dana Lawrence, Sara Engelhardt, Jean Lawrence, Ruddick Lawrence, Jr., Daniel Lawrence, and the late Megan Lawrence, and stepfather of Leslie Tawfik and Caroline Blydenburgh. Loving grandfather to 14 grandchildren. Service Saturday, October 7, 10:30 AM, at Christ Church, Bronxville. Donations in lieu of flowers may be sent to Jansen Memorial Hospice, 69 Main St, Tuckahoe, NY 10707.
